context: Tests whether the agent can update and revalidate existing AGENTS.md after repository changes, ensuring documentation stays synchronized.

checklist.name: Change detection
checklist.description: Agent detected what changed in the repository (new scripts, removed dependencies, etc.)

checklist.name: Removed stale content
checklist.description: Removed or updated instructions for removed tooling/commands

checklist.name: Added new content
checklist.description: Added instructions for new tooling or commands

checklist.name: Structure still appropriate
checklist.description: Documentation structure remains appropriate for project (simple vs hierarchical)

checklist.name: Command validation
checklist.description: Validated that commands still work after changes

checklist.name: No duplication introduced
checklist.description: Did not introduce new duplication during update

checklist.name: References updated
checklist.description: References to external docs are still valid
